entry.title: Game: Rygar (NES, 1987)
entry.content: This is a cross between Ninja Gaiden and Castlevania but with terrible art and really loose, sloppy game play. Reading about the game on Wikipedia makes it seem so cool, but the mechanics are just way too bad to push through to what sounds like it would be good. I have no connection in my history to this game, so it is easy to say "Who cares?"
